titles.title: Persons With Disabilities Trusts Tax Rate Restoration Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 Federal income tax rate increases on trusts established for the benefit of individuals with disabilities or for college education costs of a beneficiary.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16488-16489)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Persons With Disabilities Trusts Tax Rate Restoration Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 1993 rate increase in the rate of income tax as applied to trusts established for: (1) individuals who are disabled; (2) support and maintenance of individuals under age 21 whose parents are deceased; and (3) higher education costs of the grantor's children or grandchildren.
